title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.280 - Scrapple
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.280 - Scrapple

State Regulations

Scrapple shall contain not less than 40 percent meat
and/or meat by-products computed on the basis of the fresh weight, exclusive of
bone. The meal or flour used may be derived from grain and/or
soybeans. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1

319.280

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
